name: Continental Capital
overview:
Continental Capital Group consultants analyze and purchase charged off assets from banks and financial institutions. Our acquisition of these assets will result in the liquidation of a negative on your books giving the bank a positive cash flow allowing recapitalization.

Many banks and financial institutions in today’s economic times are experiencing an increase in non-performing assets leading to more and more charge-offs. Continental Capital Group consultants will evaluate and purchase any type of charge-off loans, from real estate to consumer lines of credit. No pool of assets is too large or too small. Our focus is to help you recapitalize.

Continental Capital Group’s area of expertise is its ability to leverage the insight of our partners and current business associates from deal sourcing and due diligence through competitive analysis. What this means to you is a broader resolution to remedy your charge-off assets.

Why spend possibly years trying to collect these charge-off assets when you can turn them into cash now. Call us now and let us analyze your situation and you’ll be thanking us all the way to the bank.
